column2: Piracy in the Strait of Malacca has long been a threat to ship owners and the mariners who ply the sea lane.
From the fury of the Pirates deliver us!
Every sea raiding culture in the Far East is granted shipyards and gets scaled to seafaring technology I

Maṇḍala is a Sanskrit word meaning 'circle'. The mandala is a model for describing the patterns of diffuse political power in early Southeast Asian history, when local power was more important than the central leadership.
